description: Selects all elements that are the first child of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the first child of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the last child of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the last child of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the first child of a specific type of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the first <p> element of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the last child of a specific type of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the last <p> element of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the nth-child of their parent (index starts with 1). The parameter can be index, even, odd, or an equation.
selects: All <p> elements that are the 4th child of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the nth-child of their parent, counting from the last element(index = 1) to the first. The parameter can be index, even, odd, or an equation.
selects: All <p> elements that are the last child of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the nth child of a specific type of their parent (index starts with 1). The parameter can be index, even, odd, or an equation.
selects: All <p> elements that are the 4th <p> element of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the nth child of a specific type of their parent, counting from the last element(index = 1) to the first. The parameter can be index, even, odd, or an equation.
selects: All <p> elements that are the last <p> element of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the only child of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the only child of their parent

description: Selects all elements that are the only child of a specific type of their parent.
selects: All <p> elements that are the only <p> element of their parent
